Source.Name: libdbi-drivers
Source.Summary: Drivers for the Database Independent Abstraction Layer for C
Source.Description: The libdbi-drivers project maintains drivers for the libdbi database abstraction layer written in C. Drivers are distributed seperately from the library itself.

Package.Name: libdbi-drivers

Package.Description: The libdbi-drivers project maintains drivers for the libdbi database abstraction layer written in C. Drivers are distributed seperately from the library itself.
